section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: Shu'aib bin Harb reported from Malik, from Zubaid, from Ibn Abza, from his father, who said:"The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to recite in witr: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High;" and "Say: O you disbelievers!;' and 'Say: He is Allah, (the) One
